description._content: National letter writing week, Oct. 1-7 Chicago : Illinois WPA Art Project, [between 1936 and 1940] 1 print on board (poster) : silkscreen, color. Notes: Date stamped on verso: Feb 16 1940. Work Projects Administration Poster Collection (Library of Congress). Poster showing a mail carrier holding a letter. Subjects: Correspondence--1930-1940. Letter carriers--1930-1940. Format: Posters--1930-1940. Screen prints--Color--1930-1940. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print More information about the WPA Posters is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.wpapos Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3b48755 Call Number: POS - WPA - ILL .01 .N387, no. 1
